author: Kate Gibson
title: Texas judge blasts Hobby Lobby for ignoring stay-at-home order
description: "99.9% of the business community puts public health over profits," Dallas County judge says in admonishing retailer.
content:
Hobby Lobby is facing a multi-state backlash for keeping some of its stores amid the spreading coronavirus, with a Texas official suggesting that the arts-and-craft retailer is endangering public health. 
The Oklahoma City-based company's controversial stanc… [+5274 chars]
